title: "I didn't think it would last this long" - You bet your butt I'm salty
body:
In any video game, a match can last anywhere from zero to an hour and beyond.
The playerbase needs to realise that running out of time because "I didn't think it would last this long" is no longer an excuse.
In the early days of League, you could use that excuse because you were only just getting started on the Field of Justice. 
At level 30, everyone is aware of how long a match can take. There is no #notallsummoners here. Everyone who plays video games knows that matches can take longer than you would think. Just one more match before school, one more match before time runs out, please don't.
Please think of the other players on your team before hitting that play button.

replies.body:
@Zrin 

Unfortunate to hear about your experience on the fields of justice! but you're correct. There is no specific report for people leaving because they thought the game wouldn't last as long as it did.

League of Legends - Summoners Rift gives a rough average on how long the games can take. Anywhere between 20 - 45 minutes. The only thing that I can advice you to do is just report for AFK. This is probably the most suitable report if a player decides to leave or go inactive. 

That way the player could get warned or punished and then given a reason to think about if they have enough time to play a game that could go more then 45 minutes. As long as you report appropriately the League of Legends report system can punish correctly. 

Don't disregard! it happens to more then just you! 

Enjoy your games!
Its going afk, i dont care the reason. report for afk.
